how_work.title: How We Work
how_work.step1_desc: Browse profiles of psychologists, psychotherapists, psychiatrists, sexologists, and addiction specialists. Review their experience, approaches, and reviews to choose your expert.
how_work.step2_desc: Choose a convenient day and time in the online schedule. Pay for the session securely and receive a reminder before the consultation.
how_work.step3_desc: Join the session from anywhere in the world. Confidential, safe, and without unnecessary stress.

test.title: Tests
test.description: Answer a few simple questions to better understand your mental health condition. Find out your anxiety level.
test.note: Results are indicative and do not replace specialist consultation.

help.card4: cope with anxiety and panic attacks

newMission.title: If you're unsure
newMission.description: You don't necessarily need to immediately 'get treated' or start long-term therapy. Try one session. Sometimes that's enough to feel better - or to finally understand the root of the problem.
newMission.question: Ready to try?

contacts.title: Frequent Questions
cards: How to choose the right specialist?
How much does a consultation cost?
Is online therapy suitable for serious problems?
Can I cancel or reschedule an appointment?

questions.a: Anxiety is a normal body response to stress. When it becomes chronic, it can interfere with sleep, concentration, and cause physical symptoms like rapid heartbeat, sweating, trembling. Breathing techniques, psychotherapy, and physical activity help.
Depression is characterized by persistent sadness, loss of interest in favorite activities, reduced energy, changes in appetite and sleep. Therapy, social support, and medication can help.
Panic attacks are sudden episodes of intense fear with physical symptoms: rapid heartbeat, shortness of breath, trembling. Psychotherapy, breathing exercises, and sometimes medication are helpful.
Phobias are irrational fears of specific objects or situations. Working with them through exposure, cognitive methods, and relaxation helps.
Relationship problems can arise from poor communication, distrust, or unclear boundaries. Couples therapy and improving communication skills often help.
Burnout is emotional exhaustion, cynicism, loss of motivation. Rest, work-life balance, support, and psychological help are beneficial.
Low self-esteem manifests in self-criticism and feelings of inadequacy. Improvement is possible through changing beliefs, self-acceptance, and therapy.
Sexual life problems can be related to stress, physical health, trauma, or distrust. Open communication and professional help can be beneficial.
Childhood trauma can cause lasting psychological consequences: difficulties with trust, emotional instability. Therapy and trauma-focused approaches aid recovery.
Aggression and irritability often appear due to stress, unresolved emotions, or trauma. Anger management techniques, physical activity, and therapy can help.

tests.title: Tests

hero.title: We believe that mental health care should be as normal as visiting a doctor or going to the gym
hero.description: Terapiya.life is the first mental health platform in Uzbekistan that connects people with certified psychologists, psychotherapists, psychiatrists, sexologists, and coaches - online and offline.

why.card1: One in four people experiences a psychological crisis at least once in their lifetime.
why.card2: But over 60% of people don't seek help - due to fear, shame, or unavailability of specialists.
list: Only certified psychologists, psychotherapists, psychiatrists, and coaches work on the platform - each specialist undergoes diploma verification and personal interview.
We created a convenient online and offline booking system - without queues and long waits.
We collaborate with clinics, private specialists, and corporate clients, creating employee support programs.
Hundreds of requests from people who decided to seek help for the first time - and remained in therapy.

hero2.title: You don't have to cope alone.
hero2.description: And now you don't need to search for support blindly - we've already found it for you.

items.question: Clinics and Private Centers
items.answer: We offer collaboration to expand patient access to quality psychological help and unite efforts in mental health.

items.question: HR and Companies
items.answer: We create corporate employee support programs, help reduce stress levels and increase team engagement.

items.question: Associations and Educational Organizations
items.answer: We collaborate with training centers and associations to develop professional community and create joint projects.

items.question: Psychologists and Psychiatrists
items.answer: We're open to collaboration with specialists who want to develop, share experience, and help more people.

about-page.title: About Us
about-page.description: Our project is a platform for finding mental health specialists. We strive to help people find qualified specialists, providing convenient and reliable search. Our mission is to support mental health and wellbeing through access to quality specialist help.
about-page.articlesText: Here you'll find the project history, interviews with founders, as well as our philosophy and mission: 'Why We Created Terapiya.life'.

q1.question: What's most important for you right now?
q1.a2: I want practical advice and techniques
q1.a3: I might need medical help or medication

q3.question: What do you expect from a specialist?
q3.a3: Check if medical help or medication is needed
q3.a5: Help reducing or stopping substance use

q4.question: What else do you notice in yourself?
q4.a3: Suspicion of mental disorder or experience with medications
